In England, in the seven days to 09 January, there were 902,705 new confirmed cases (1,596.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 January, there were 1,018,779 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 11% (116,074 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 January is 12,766,944 (22,576.3 cases per 100,000 population).
